resources.string: This app simulates Volume Button activity by adding a tile to Quick Settings on Notification Drawer.
Open Notification Drawer and go to Edit Mode. You will find Volume tile at the bottom part. Add it to Quick Tiles.
Whenever you need to adjust device volume, pull down the Notification Drawer and tap on Volume tile. It will display the Volume Panel.
Below buttons are only for testing. When you tap on those buttons, the Volume Panel should be displayed.
